question: Architectural styles is composed of which of the following?
options: a) A set of component types that perform some function at run-time
b) A topological layout of these components indicating their run-time inter relationships
c) A set of semantic constraints
explanation: All of the mentioned are true with respect to the architectural styles.

question: In which of the following style new clients can be added easily?

question: What is correct about Data centered architecture?
options: a) It is modifiable with respect to changing the functionality of any particular client as other clients will not be affected
b) It is non-modifiable with respect to changing the functionality of any particular client as other clients will be affected
c) Coupling among the client will lessen the effect of data center architecture
explanation: It is modifiable with respect to changing the functionality of any particular client as other clients will not be affected, Coupling among the client will lessen the effect of data center architecture are the correct architectures.
